# Introduction

This is a book created from markdown\index{markdown} and executable code.

Here's a basic plot:


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ggplot2)

pie <- ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = factor(1), fill = factor(cyl))) +
 geom_bar(width = 1)
pie + coord_polar(theta = "y")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![A pie chart using polar coordinates.](intro_files/figure-pdf/fig-polar-1.pdf){#fig-polar fig-pos='H'}
:::
:::



See @knuth84 for additional discussion of literate programming\index{literate programming}.
